description: Running out of memory when loading or processing large bitmaps. Common in apps that handle images, especially high-resolution photos.
commonCauses: Memory leaks keeping bitmap references alive
Caching too many bitmaps in memory
Creating bitmaps on every recomposition in Compose
solutions: Use BitmapFactory.Options with inSampleSize to downsample
Use Glide or Coil for automatic memory management
Use RGB_565 instead of ARGB_8888 when alpha not needed
Implement LRU cache for bitmap caching
prevention: Always downsample images to required display size
Use image loading libraries (Glide, Coil, Picasso)
Monitor memory usage during image operations
Use inBitmap for bitmap reuse when possible
Avoid loading images on main thread
Clear bitmap caches when memory is low
